  • object
    uid: SettingsValues

    User input result of a SettingsPage as key values.

    • key: id of the field
    • value: entered user value as string. This is either the entered text or number, selected checkbox state or the selected dropdown item id.
      Non native string values as numbers or booleans are represented as string values!
    Additional properties:
    string
  • object
    uid: languageText
    ^[a-z]{2}(_\w+)?$
    (pattern property)
    string

    Key value pairs of language texts. Key: ISO 639-1 code with optional country suffix to represent a culture code. Examples: en, en_UK, en_US, de, de_CH.
    If we need to support more regional differences within a country, then the IETF language tag might be a solution. This would even support the various Swiss German dialects!

    Additional properties are NOT allowed.

  • object
    uid: versionInfo
    model
    string

    Short model identifier of the remote (UCR2 for Remote Two, UCR3 for Remote 3).

    device_name
    string

    Custom name of the remote

    hostname
    string

    Hostname of the remote

    address
    string

    MAC address of the remote

    api
    string

    API version

    core
    string

    Core app version

    ui
    string

    Frontend app version

    os
    string

    Operating system version

    Additional properties are allowed.

  • object
    uid: localizationSettings
    language_code
    string
    must match: ^[a-z]{2}(_\w+)?$uid: languageCode

    Language culture code: starting with the two-letter ISO-639-1 code, followed by an optional ISO-3166 country code, separated by an underscore. Examples: en, en_UK, en_US, de, de_DE, de_CH etc.

    country_code
    string
    format: iso-3166uid: countryCode

    Two-letter country codes defined in ISO-3166-1-alpha-2

    time_zone
    string

    Time zone name according to IANA https://www.iana.org/time-zones, e.g. Europe/Copenhagen.

    time_format_24h
    boolean
    Default value:true
    measurement_unit
    string
    uid: measurementUnit
      Allowed values:
    • "METRIC"
    • "US"
    • "UK"

    Additional properties are allowed.

  • languageCode
    string
    must match: ^[a-z]{2}(_\w+)?$uid: languageCode

    Language culture code: starting with the two-letter ISO-639-1 code, followed by an optional ISO-3166 country code, separated by an underscore. Examples: en, en_UK, en_US, de, de_DE, de_CH etc.

  • countryCode
    string
    format: iso-3166uid: countryCode

    Two-letter country codes defined in ISO-3166-1-alpha-2

  • measurementUnit
    string
    uid: measurementUnit
      Allowed values:
    • "METRIC"
    • "US"
    • "UK"
  • object
    uid: runtimeInfo
    driver_id
    required
    string

    Identifier under which this integration driver is accessible in the Remote.

    array<string>

    Defined integration instance identifiers of this integration driver in the Remote.
    Only single-device integration drivers are supported at the moment, i.e. there's maximum one integration instance per driver.

    Items:
    string
    log_id
    string

    Log service identifier for a custom integration driver running on the Remote.

    Additional properties are allowed.

  • iconIdentifier
    string
    <= 255 charactersuid: iconIdentifier

    Optional icon identifier. If specified the icon will be set. An empty identifier while updating the object removes the existing icon.

  • object
    uid: DeviceButtonMapping
    button
    required
    string

    Physical button identifier

    object
    uid: EntityCommand
    cmd_id
    required
    string

    Simple command name or entity command identifier, as returned in the entity command metadata.

    object

    For entity commands: optional command parameters as key / value pairs. See entity documentation for available parameters.

    Additional properties are allowed.

    Additional properties are allowed.

  • object
    uid: UserInterface
    array<object>
    page_id
    required
    string
    name
    string

    Optional page name

    required
    object
    uid: Grid

    Grid layout size.

    width
    required
    integer
    >= 1
    height
    required
    integer
    >= 1

    Additional properties are allowed.

    required
    array<object>
    type
    required
    string

    Type of the user interface item:

    • icon: show an icon, either a UC icon or a custom icon. Field icon must contain the icon identifier.
    • text: show text only from field text.
      Allowed values:
    • "icon"
    • "text"
    • "numpad"
    icon
    string

    Optional icon identifier. The identifier consists of a prefix and a resource identifier, separated by :. Available prefixes:

    • uc: - integrated icon font
    • custom: - custom resource
    text
    string
    object
    uid: EntityCommand
    cmd_id
    required
    string

    Simple command name or entity command identifier, as returned in the entity command metadata.

    Additional properties are allowed.

    Additional properties are allowed.

    >= 1

  • object
    uid: UserInterfaceItem

    A user interface item is either an icon, text or media information from a media-player entity.

    • Icon and text items can be static or linked to a command specified in the command field.
    • Default size is 1x1 if not specified.
    type
    required
    string

    Type of the user interface item:

    • icon: show an icon, either a UC icon or a custom icon. Field icon must contain the icon identifier.
    • text: show text only from field text.
      Allowed values:
    • "icon"
    • "text"
    • "numpad"
    icon
    string

    Optional icon identifier. The identifier consists of a prefix and a resource identifier, separated by :. Available prefixes:

    • uc: - integrated icon font
    • custom: - custom resource
    text
    string
    object

    cmd_id

    Additional properties are allowed.

    Additional properties are allowed.

  • object
    uid: EmitterPort
    id
    string
    [ 1 .. 32 ] characters
    name
    string
    [ 1 .. 50 ] characters

    Additional properties are allowed.

  • IrFormat
    string
    uid: IrFormat

    Supported IR formats by the emitter

      Allowed values:
    • "PRONTO"
    • "HEX"
  • object
    uid: Oauth2Token

    OAuth token response, based on https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc6749#section-5.1

    access_token
    required
    string

    The access token issued by the authorization server.

    token_type
    required
    string

    The type of the token issued. E.g. Bearer.

    expires_in
    integer

    The time period (in seconds) for which the access_token is valid.

    refresh_token
    string

    The refresh token, which can be used to obtain new access tokens using the same authorization grant.

    scope
    string

    A space-separated list of scopes which have been granted for this access_token.

    Additional properties are allowed.
